statements: SELECT * FROM plants;
SELECT plant_name, plant_type, growth_stage FROM plants WHERE health_status IS NULL;
SELECT plant_name, plant_type FROM plants WHERE health_status = 'healthy' ORDER BY plant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM plants WHERE growth_stage > 2 AND plant_date <= '2022-10-01';
SELECT plant_name, health_status FROM plants WHERE growth_stage = 1 ORDER BY health_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM plants WHERE plant_type = 'Flower' ORDER BY plant_date DESC, growth_stage ASC;
SELECT plant_name, health_status FROM plants WHERE health_status IS NOT NULL AND plant_tag = 'Indoor' ORDER BY plant_name ASC;
SELECT plant_name, plant_type FROM plants WHERE growth_stage > 2 ORDER BY plant_type ASC, plant_name DESC;
SELECT plant_name, plant_type, health_status FROM plants WHERE health_status = 'Good' AND plant_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY plant_date DESC;
SELECT plant_name, growth_stage FROM plants WHERE plant_type IN ('Fruit', 'Vegetable') AND growth_stage BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY plant_name ASC, growth_stage DESC;
SELECT * FROM plants;
SELECT plant_name, growth_stage FROM plants WHERE health_status = 'Healthy';
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM farm_crops WHERE growth_status = 'Growing';
SELECT plant_name, plant_type FROM plants ORDER BY plant_type DESC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM farm_crops ORDER BY harvest_date ASC;
SELECT plant_name, health_status FROM plants WHERE growth_stage = 'Seedling';
SELECT * FROM farm_crops WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT plant_type FROM plants ORDER BY plant_name DESC;
SELECT plant_name, crop_name FROM plants JOIN farm_crops ON plants.plant_id = farm_crops.plant_id ORDER BY crop_name ASC;

SELECT plant_name, growth_stage, planting_date, harvest_date FROM plants JOIN farm_crops ON plants.plant_id = farm_crops.plant_id WHERE growth_status = 'Healthy' AND health_notes IS NULL ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM plants WHERE id = 1;
SELECT plant_name, growth_data FROM plants WHERE plant_name LIKE 'Rose%';
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, yield_amount FROM crops WHERE harvest_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM farm WHERE ST_Y(location) < 50.0;
SELECT farm_name, size_area FROM farm ORDER BY size_area DESC;
SELECT id, plant_name, growth_data FROM plants ORDER BY plant_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, crop_name, planting_date FROM crops WHERE yield_amount > 100 ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT id, farm_name, ST_X(location) AS latitude, ST_Y(location) AS longitude FROM farm WHERE ST_Distance(location, POINT(40.7128, -74.0060)) < 1000;
SELECT id, crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crops WHERE yield_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY harvest_date DESC;
SELECT id, plant_name, JSONB_ARRAY_ELEMENTS_TEXT(growth_data) AS growth_info FROM plants WHERE plant_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Plants;
SELECT plant_name, plant_type FROM Plants WHERE health_status = 'Healthy';
SELECT plant_name, planted_date FROM Plants WHERE plant_type = 'Flower';
SELECT * FROM GrowthData ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT plant_name, height, width FROM GrowthData JOIN Plants ON GrowthData.plant_id = Plants.plant_id;
SELECT * FROM Plants WHERE plant_type = 'Fern' ORDER BY planted_date DESC;
SELECT plant_name, health_status FROM Plants WHERE health_status = 'Good' AND plant_type = 'Flower' ORDER BY plant_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_season FROM Crops WHERE planting_season = 'Spring' AND crop_type = 'Vegetable' ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT plant_name, measurement_date, height FROM GrowthData WHERE height > 10.00 ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Pruning' AND plant_id = 3 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Plants;
SELECT plant_name, plant_type FROM Plants WHERE plant_type = 'flower';
SELECT plant_name, planting_date FROM Plants ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Crops WHERE harvest_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT plant_name, growth_stage FROM Plant_Growth INNER JOIN Plants ON Plant_Growth.plant_id = Plants.plant_id;
SELECT * FROM Plants;
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, plant_type FROM Plants WHERE plant_type = 'Flower';
SELECT plant_id, plant_name, planting_date FROM Plants ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Crops WHERE harvest_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT Plants.plant_id, Plants.plant_name, Plant_Growth.growth_date, Plant_Growth.growth_stage FROM Plants INNER JOIN Plant_Growth ON Plants.plant_id = Plant_Growth.plant_id;
